mean_cn: n. 原生代；  adj. 原生代的
mean_en: the later of two divisions of the Precambrian era, during which the earliest plants and animals are assumed to have lived
sentence: There were no mammals on earth during the Proterozoic era.
sentence_trans: 在元古代时期，地球上没有哺乳动物。
word_etyma: pro向前，在前 ＋ terozo=terrazzo磨石子地；水磨石 ＋ ic...的 → 在水磨石的时代前 → proterozoic原生代
